summary: This is my first time working with textures, and I had a great time working on this one. I hope you all enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
**UPDATE FEED**
11/21/11 - Added the Molten DragonScale shield on optional downloads.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11/20/11 - Added the female body to the main download as well..
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.2 is now out...
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This was for my personal use, but I decided to upload this for anyone who wishes to download it! This is also my first time working with textures, and I had a great time working on this one. I hope you all enjoy!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Check out my other textures!

author: VarCryne
